sentences.en: Although the mantra is definitely efficacious, still, you have to samadhi.
sentences.cn: 这个咒固然是灵, 但是定力也要修的.

sentences.en: an equally efficacious method of treatment
Asarum is an efficacious traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.cn: 细辛(马兜铃科细辛属)为我国传统中草药,具有祛风散寒,通窍止痛,温肺化饮之功效,自古以来,一直被医家视为祛除痼疾的常用药.

sentences.en: Conclusion: interferon, thymosin and new nucleotide similitude are efficacious medicines.
sentences.cn: 胸腺肽及核苷酸类似物如拉米呋定、法昔洛韦等.

sentences.en: Conclusion: MEBO is very efficacious in treating contact dermatitis.
sentences.cn: 结论: MEBO治疗接触性皮炎疗效显著.

sentences.en: Example is always more efficacious than precept.
It occurs to me that example is always more efficacious than precept.
On - site verification and application prove that the system is practicable and efficacious.
sentences.cn: 该系统在油田现场工业实践验证和应用表明,既避免了机组恶性事故的发生,又有利于改变传统的定期维护方式,延长了机组的平均工作周期.

sentences.en: The ancestral prescription is said to be efficacious against renal weakness.
sentences.cn: 祖传的医方据说对于治疗肾虚效果很好.

sentences.en: The medicine is efficacious in stopping a cough.
sentences.cn: 这种药在止咳方面很灵验.

sentences.en: The nasal spray was new on the market and highly efficacious.
sentences.cn: 这种鼻腔喷雾剂是新上市的，非常有效。

sentences.en: This medicine is efficacious against heart disease.
Triterpenoids are the main efficacious ingredients in ganoderma spore lipids.
sentences.cn: 灵芝三萜类化合物是灵芝孢子油中的主要功效成分.
种牛痘防天花是有效的.
